divs: Sighting DetailsA Small black circular object seemed to be following just above and slightly behind a plane as the plane was coming into the city from the west. Suddenly the object turned bright white for approximately 5 seconds and disappeared from view.
trends: There have been 76 other sightings in Calgary
There were no other sightings in Calgary on or around July 6th 2010
Summary: Small black circular object following above and slightly behind a plane, turned bright white and disappeared.
